name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course introduces the entire process of qualitative research from conceptualizing a problem to writing the narrative. Students will learn the components of qualitative research and the ways in which these relate to one another. By doing so, they are expected to be equipped with the knowledge regarding the logic and coherence of a qualitative study. Through writing the narrative, students will also learn to present to the audience an in-depth understanding of the problem or issue studied and the reasons that govern it.
